resources.string:
Welcome in Cucina Italiana, the app that test your knowledge of the italian traditional cuisine

Show your love for the best food in the world!

Good luck and buon appetito!

string-array.name: multiple_1
string-array.item: What is the cheese used in the preparation of "tiramisù"?

string-array.name: multiple_2
string-array.item: What is the native region of "pesto"?

string-array.name: multiple_3
string-array.item: What is the cereal most often used to make "polenta"?

string-array.name: multiple_4
string-array.item: What does "panna cotta" means in italian?

string-array.name: check_list_1
string-array.item: Which of these ingredients are used in the "carbonara"?

string-array.name: check_list_2
string-array.item: What are the layers of "lasagne alla bolognese"?

string-array.name: open_1
string-array.item: What is the name of the typical neapolitan pizza?

resources.string: Congratulation, you finished the CucinaItaliana quiz!\n\nYour score is:
